WorkItem.Description: Idol of Perspicacious Attacks was showing before with maul & swipe damage modifiers, but with .20 version it's only showing bonus swipe damage, and the maul multiplier seems gone from the item editor.

Comments.Message: Err, I removed BonusMaulDamageMultiplier (since it's unused); that is *not* the correct stat for that Idol. Sounds like you may have an old item cache. I don't know that we've ever bothered to model that idol, since it's terrible and you're always doing something wrong if you're using it.

well, there are times where I like being terrible & doing something wrong. which is also how I found out about black magic working for ferals.
And if I had old item cache, blame yourselves, since I was just using the item cache included in rawr itself.
Updating the item via wowhead or armory just turns it into a blank item with no supported stat at all, which.. I guess just means I'm even more terrible.
That attitude wasn't really what I was looking for...

The issue with the idol appearing was my fault. We had Venture Coin as a  filtering option and I figured to add them as best I could. I manually edited the idol to the best of my ability and the closest I could come up with was that BonusMaulDamageMultiplier for that idol. If you want to blame someone, blame me.

Hina: I actually don't want to blame anyone, I was just surprised to see it change between releases in a such way. But it was Astrylian's reply (or last half of it) that rubbed me the really wrong way. but whatever.
